title: Won 3 out of my 5 promo games to silver but i didnt put me in silver
body:
I am bronze 1 and i was in my promos to silver 5. I rarely play ranked by my self , i play ranked only when we are at leats 3 man premade.
That day we played all 5 of my promo games and we won 3 out of the 5 games. When we finished the last game I thought that i will be placed in silver but i didnt and i still dont understand why. Can someone explane why i didnt ranked. Myb its a bug, idk pls help.

replies.body: You lost 4 of your last 6 games; so, if 3 of those were your promo matches then what you are saying is false.

To rank up from bronze 1 to silver you need to win at least 3 out of the 5 promos.
1st game cass mid on the 25th/oct-win
2nd game oriana mid 26th/oct-win
3rd game vel mid 26th/oct-lost
4th game thresh supp 26th/oct-lost
5th game cass mid 27th/oct-win
Don't you need to win 4 out of 7 games to get promoted from bronze 1 to silver 5?

I think this happened to me.   I didnt do all the Promos in one day but I thought I had lost the promos but at the end of the match It said I was 2 of 5 and Im quite sure I had dont 3 other games in Promos.   Still lost because of the "Bad luck" stacking Riot does on your team while in promos but.
Online it says you've lost 3 of your last 5 games

So you need 5 games to rank up. I won 3 out of my 5 games 
1st game i was playing cass mid on the 25th/oct-win
2nd game oriana mid 26th/oct-win
3rd game vel mid 26th/oct-lost
4th game thresh supp 26th/oct-lost
5th game cass mid 27/oct-win

Online it says you're in promos now, 1 win 2 losses.  The three games after the the 5 you mention match up with those 3 in the promos. So either you were not in promos during those 5 games you just mentioned and that last win put you in promos, or you were in promos and did the 5 games but then instead of being promoted you were just put back into promos?

Yeah I were in promos and after the last match I expected to get promoted but nothing appeared like you just got promoted to silver 5 but insted it says "you have qualified for the series". In a nutshell I was in promos won the req 3 games, after the last game i got put back in promos...
Well that is odd, you'd be the first person that happened to if it really happened like that.
